title: The Liger Plague [Book 1] - Joseph Souza.epub
description:
Colonel Tag Winters is a happy man. HeÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s about to vacation on CookeÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Island, Maine with his wife and daughter. Until he receives a mysterious phone callÃ¢â‚¬â€someone has released an unidentified virus on the island during the busiest day of the summer.

He thought he could kick back and relax. He thought he could finally retire from his job dealing with deadly viruses and transition to a genteel life of teaching and scholarly research.

He was so wrong. Now his family has gone missing and all the evidence points to him as the perpetrator of this biological attack.

As the people on CookeÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s become infected with the virus, he soon realizes that he must prevent the infected from leaving the island or else risk the plague spreading to the mainland and turning normal citizens into deranged killers. As the once-beautiful island descends into unthinkable violence and mayhem, TagÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s determination to find his family and clear his good name strengthens, as does his fierce will to survive with his humanity intact.
